metadata.title: CVE-2018-1999015 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg before commit 5aba5b89d0b1d73164d3b81764828bb8b20ff32a contains anout of array read vulnerability in ASF_F format demuxer that can result inheap memory reading. This attack appear to be exploitable via speciallycrafted ASF file that has to provided as input. This vulnerability appearsto have been fixed in 5aba5b89d0b1d73164d3b81764828bb8b20ff32a and later.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
